titleStmt.title: Worcesters apophthegmes or witty sayings of the Right Honourable Henry (late) Marquess and Earl of Worcester, delivered upon severall occasions, and now published for the benefit of the reader. By T.B. a constant observer, and no lesse admirer of his Lordships wisdom and loyalty.
titleStmt.author: Worcester, Henry Somerset, Marquis of, 1577-1646.
Bayly, Thomas, d. 1657?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Clowes, for Edward Blackmore, at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
